items.title: CrowdStrike and McDonald’s downgraded: Wall Street’s top analyst calls
items.description: The most talked about and market moving research calls around Wall Street are now in one place. Here are today’s research calls that investors need to know, as compiled by The Fly. Top 5 Upgrades: Melius Research upgraded Deere (DE) to Buy from Hold with a $750 price target. The firm believes Deere’s “leading position” in agriculture technology will deliver “transformational value” to farmers.
